name: Rotamouse
description:
Made for the Kenney Jam 2021. The theme was Rotation, and so my thought went to a level that if you saw it, you could see that the background rotated - the game makes up a full rotation. I don't think I displayed it well, but oh well. This was also my first time working with Game Maker Studio 2. I don't know why the 1-bit style called to me - perhaps I'm just feeling retro.

I hope you enjoy this short experience. While there are sound effects, I decided to leave it music-less - I tend to play my own music while working and playing. (And, ahem. Sound was... well, there were ISSUES debugging it.)
